entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
